742820.name: Way of Defector - Character Joo Yong-hyun
742820.description:
New character Joo Yong-hyun

He, an executive of the Chosun Labour Party, felt a death crisis after he lost his authority. Eventually, he had to cross a river to survive.

Key features

  • He cannot use the store since he is wanted by the police.
  • You can steal foods by using ability or steal items by casting dice. But crackdown gauge increases when you steal any food or item.
  • This is a unique character that cannot use the store so that this character has to play the game centered on its ability. You need to use public security officer inquiry wisely for this character as crackdown gauge increases when using ability.
